description: Easily add more storage options to your netbook or notebook computer with Verbatim’s stay-in Store ‘n’ Stay USB drive. Allowing storage in a drive that fits in the body of a Nano receiver, the USB drive features a snag-free design for easy transport, which is also removable for easy file sharing. Compatible with Windows 7 and Vista, the Store 'n' Stay USB offers a USB 2.0 interface that is a great addition to any netbook. This always there, always ready USB flash drive is available in capacities of 4GB, 8GB, and 16GB.
title: Verbatim Store 'n' Stay 4 GB USB 2.0 Flash Drive, Black 97462
